mapper.update: update ums_admin set admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_id = #{iconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_name, `password`, icon_id, email, nick_name, note, create_time, sys_id from ums_admin where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select admin_id, admin_name, `password`, icon_id, email, nick_name, note, create_time, sys_id from ums_admin
